Package org.springcorebankapp.user

Interface UserRepository

All Superinterfaces:
org.springframework.data.repository.CrudRepository<User,Integer>, org.springframework.data.jpa.repository.JpaRepository<User,Integer>, org.springframework.data.repository.ListCrudRepository<User,Integer>, org.springframework.data.repository.ListPagingAndSortingRepository<User,Integer>, org.springframework.data.repository.PagingAndSortingRepository<User,Integer>, org.springframework.data.repository.query.QueryByExampleExecutor<User>, org.springframework.data.repository.Repository<User,Integer>
@Repository("userRepository") public interface UserRepository extends org.springframework.data.jpa.repository.JpaRepository<User,Integer>
Repository interface for accessing and manipulating user data in the database.

This interface extends the JpaRepository interface, providing CRUD operations for the User entity, as well as custom query methods for user-specific functionality.

Version:
1.0.0
Author:
Mukhammed Lolo

  • Method Details

    • findByLogin

      Optional<User> findByLogin(String login)
      Finds a user by their login.

      This method retrieves a user from the database based on the login provided. The login is assumed to be unique across all users.

      Parameters:
      login - the login of the user to be found
      Returns:
      an Optional containing the user if found, or an empty Optional if not

    • existsUserByLogin

      boolean existsUserByLogin(String login)
      Checks if a user with the given login exists in the database.

      This method performs a check to determine if a user with the specified login already exists.

      Parameters:
      login - the login to check for existence
      Returns:
      true if a user with the given login exists, false otherwise
